mapper.delete: delete from team_member where team_code like 'banzu%'
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id teamMemberId, t2.team_code teamCode, t3.user_code userCode, t1.TEAM_POSITION isLeader, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t1.JOIN_DATE)*1000 createTime FROM kc_team_user t1 JOIN kc_team t2 ON t1.team_id = t2.team_id JOIN sys_user_info t3 ON t1.USER_ID = t3.user_id
